description.value:
The mind can flit from thought to thought; why too shouldn't you? You focus on motion in a higher order of spatial dimensions, not just the typical three, allowing for versatile abilities that alter positioning.

Granted Spells

  • 1st: @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Thoughtful Gift]
  • 2nd: @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Enlarge]
  • 3rd: @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Rally Point]
  • 4th: @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Dimension Door]
  • 5th: @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Strange Geometry]
  • 6th: @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Collective Transposition]
  • 7th: @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Momentary Recovery]
  • 8th: @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Maze]
  • 9th: @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Bilocation]

Standard Psi Cantrips

  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Phase Bolt]
  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Warp Step]

Unique Psi Cantrips

  • surface: @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Distortion Lens]
  • deeper: @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Ghostly Shift]
  • deepest: @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Tesseract Tunnel]
